name: Frog Dating Simulator
description:
Frog Dating Simulator presents a world of personified amphibians and follows the journey of a frog in their quest for love. 

Like most dating simulators, the end goal of Frog Dating Simulator is to happily end up with one of the four amphibian NPCs. Through links and the use of a romance meter, the player can choose responses and gifts for their date, learning their preferences through small talk. 

This is one of my first games! It was done for a class project and is relatively short, I hope you like it!
